Events > September 20, 2016

#223 Chi Safe Path

This week, weâ€™ll be hearing from two of our very own hack night-ers!

In Chicago, sidewalks are essential in connecting us to just about any activity outside our own homes. Dilapidated and inaccessible sidewalks make getting around more difficult, if not impossible.

Steven Luker, a web developer, and Adam Hecktman, Civic technologist for Microsoft, will discuss various ways that bad sidewalks not only make things difficult and dangerous for Chicagoans, and how a new civic app, Chi Safe Path, provides a way to deal with them.
Agenda and meeting notes
